meanings.definition: The quality of being considered suitable to receive financial credit.
meanings.sent1: Her creditworthiness was evident when she easily obtained a loan.
meanings.sent2: Banks evaluate your creditworthiness before approving a loan.
meanings.sent3: His impeccable creditworthiness made him the star of the financial world.
meanings.sent4: In the world of finance, creditworthiness is like a golden ticket to opportunities.
meanings.sent5: The importance of creditworthiness cannot be overstated in the financial realm.

meanings.definition: The assessment of a person's or company's ability to fulfill financial obligations.
meanings.sent1: The bank conducted a thorough check to determine his creditworthiness.
meanings.sent2: Creditworthiness is crucial for businesses to secure funding for expansion.
meanings.sent3: The company's creditworthiness report was so good, it made the accountant smile.
meanings.sent4: Her creditworthiness shone brightly in the eyes of the loan officer.
meanings.sent5: Understanding your creditworthiness is key to financial stability.
